application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents
application.label: unknown

div.head: Report:
div.p: 09.05.2016, ID23-1 2 pucks, 12 data sets were collected. Sample: The cytoplasmic domain of DotM, a component of the type IVB secretion system from Legionella pneumophila, co-crystallized/ soaked with several peptides. This is part of a research to gain new insights over the TIVBSS and its substrate recruitment mechanism. Results: The collected data sets were solved and sought for density of the desired peptides at the DotM structure. Partial, ambiguous peptide density was found in different areas near DotM surface residues, and further condition scanning is required.

div.head: 11.06.2016, ID30B
div.p: 1 puck, 4 data sets collected. Sample: The cytoplasmic domain of DotM, a component of the type IVB secretion system from Legionella pneumophila, co-crystallized/ soaked with several peptides. This is part of a research to gain new insights over the TIVBSS and its substrate recruitment mechanism. Results: The collected data sets were solved and sought for density of the desired peptides at the DotM structure. Partial, ambiguous peptide density was found in different areas near DotM surface residues, and further condition scanning is required.
